food.question: I am yellow and you peel me before you eat me. Monkeys love me! What am I?

hints.text: 🌳 I grow on trees.
💛 I am often bent or curved.
🐒 Chimpanzees enjoy me!

food.question: I am white and cold. I am good on a hot day. I come in many flavors. What am I?

hints.text: 🍦 I am a dessert.
👅 You eat me with a spoon, or in a cone!
❄️ I melt easily in the sun.

food.question: I am round and red, and grow on trees. An apple a day keeps the doctor away! What am I?

hints.text: 🌱 I have a core with seeds.
🍎 I can be many colors including green.
🥧 Sometimes I'm used to make pies!

food.question: I am long and orange. Rabbits love to eat me. What am I?

hints.text: 🥕 I am a root vegetable.
👁️ Eating me is good for your eyes.
🥗 I am often eaten raw in a salad.

food.question: I am made from milk. I can be hard or soft, and you can put me on crackers. What am I?

hints.text: 🐄 I come from animals!
🧀 I have many different smells.
🥪 Sandwiches are better with me!

food.question: I am small, green, and often eaten in a pod. Sometimes I'm served as a side dish. What am I?

hints.text: 🟢 I am a vegetable.
🍚 I am often eaten with rice or meat.
🌱 I grow in gardens.

food.question: I am a drink that comes from cows. I am white and good for your bones. What am I?

hints.text: 🥛 You often have me with cereal.
🦴 I have lots of calcium.
🍪 I am very good with cookies.

food.question: I am made of bread, cheese and tomato sauce. You bake me in an oven. What am I?

hints.text: 🍕 I am often served in slices.
🍅 I have many different toppings.
🇮🇹 I originate from Italy.

food.question: I am a fruit with a fuzzy brown skin and green flesh. Birds do not usually like me. What am I?

hints.text: 🥝 I have small black seeds inside.
🌿 I grow on a vine.
🧃 I can be added to smoothies and juices.

food.question: I am a grain that grows in water. I am often eaten in Asian countries. What am I?

hints.text: 🍚 I can be white or brown.
🌎 Many people eat me around the world.
🍣 I am often served with sushi.

ocean.question: I have many colors and fish swim through me. What am I?

hints.text: 🐠 Little fish like to swim in me!
🎨 I can be blue, green, and other colors!
🌊 I'm a big body of water!

ocean.question: I am a big animal that lives in the ocean and has eight arms. What am I?

hints.text: 🐙 I have lots of arms!
🎨 I can change my color to hide!
🏠 I live underwater.

ocean.question: I'm a very large animal that swims in the ocean and spouts water. What am I?

hints.text: 💦 I can blow water high in the air!
🐋 I am very big!
🎶 I can sing songs in the sea.

ocean.question: I live in a shell and crawl slowly on the ocean floor. What am I?

hints.text: 🏠 I carry my house on my back!
🐌 I am very slow.
🥗 I like to eat plants at the bottom of the ocean.

ocean.question: I have a pointy nose and love to play in the ocean. I also make clicking sounds! What am I?

hints.text: 🐬 I'm a very smart animal!
🗣️ I use sounds to talk to my friends.
🌊 I like to jump out of the water!

ocean.question: I am a type of home under the sea that is made by many tiny animals. What am I?

hints.text: 🧱 Many small creatures build me.
🐠 Colorful fish live in me.
🌈 I am very colorful!

ocean.question: I am a sea creature that looks like a star and lives on the bottom of the ocean. What am I?

hints.text: 🌟 I have arms that look like points on a star.
🖐 I have 5 or more arms!
🦀 I live near crabs and other bottom-dwellers

ocean.question: I am a very big fish with many sharp teeth. Some people are afraid of me. What am I?

hints.text: 🦷 I have lots of sharp teeth.
🦈 People sometimes call me a 'sea monster'!
🌊 I like to swim in deep waters.

ocean.question: I am a type of current that flows in a circle in the ocean. What am I?

hints.text: 🌀 I can make ships go in circles!
🔄 I am always moving in a circular motion.
🌡️ I help to move warm and cold water around.

ocean.question: I am a very long, deep crack in the ocean floor. Many strange creatures live here. What am I?

hints.text: 🌑 It's dark down where I am!
🌋 Some volcanoes can be found near me.
📉 I am the deepest part of the ocean.
